Summary: A light dropped straight down then dissappeared before landing.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Moose Creek
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsA star like light dropped straight down then blacked out before landing in a ravine. I was driving on the highway and saw this from a distance. I know it wasn't a shooting star or meteor because of the straight path down and the control of its light that suddenly shut off. I was happy to have seen it. I have multiple reports to file so ill try and get them in here.
